title: Upside-down gingerbread and pear cake
ingredients: ['300g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '60g butter', '60g brown sugar', '2 (415g) tins pear halves in syrup, well drained', '100g caster sugar', '120g butter, softened', '1 egg', '235ml treacle', '235ml hot water']
